title: Time-Traveler's Workshop Adventure #49
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Temporal Workshop
rooms.description: A cluttered workshop filled with strange machinery and glowing temporal devices. Blueprints cover the walls, and a large chalkboard displays complex equations. The air crackles with residual temporal energy. Gears and clockwork mechanisms litter every surface.

items.name: cluttered workbench
items.description: A wooden workbench covered in tools and half-assembled devices

items.name: temporal adjustment wrench
items.description: A specialized wrench that glows with blue energy

items.name: research filing cabinet
items.description: A metal cabinet with three drawers containing research documents

items.name: temporal research journal
items.description: A notebook filled with observations about time travel
items.text: Research Log: My first successful temporal displacement occurred in 1955. The key to stable time travel lies in understanding three principles: the name of the lead researcher (Dr Chronos), the location of temporal anchors (Quantum Laboratory), and the power source (Temporal Core).

items.name: equation chalkboard
items.description: A large board covered in temporal mechanics equations
items.text: Temporal Displacement Formula: T = (E × M) / C². Note: All experiments conducted by Dr Chronos in the Quantum Laboratory. Power drawn from the Temporal Core generator.

items.name: locked tool chest
items.description: A heavy chest secured with a mechanical lock

items.name: stabilized time crystal
items.description: A glowing crystal that pulses with temporal energy

items.name: chronometer calibration guide
items.text: Calibration Protocol: The portal requires precise temporal coordinates. Set chronometer to founding year of temporal research: 1885. Remember: Dr Chronos established the Quantum Laboratory to house the Temporal Core.

items.name: sealed laboratory door
items.description: A reinforced door with a card reader and security panel

rooms.name: Quantum Laboratory
rooms.description: A pristine laboratory with humming temporal equipment. Holographic displays show timelines branching in multiple directions. A massive temporal gateway dominates the far wall, currently inactive. Control panels and monitoring stations line the walls.

items.name: main control console
items.description: A complex console with multiple compartments and displays

items.name: gateway activation manual
items.description: A technical manual for operating the temporal gateway
items.text: Gateway Activation Procedure: Insert temporal key into primary lock. Answer security verification questions. Questions will verify: researcher identity, facility name, and power source designation.

items.name: crystalline temporal key
items.description: A key made of compressed temporal energy

items.name: temporal monitoring station
items.description: A station displaying temporal flux readings and historical data
items.text: System Status: Temporal Core operating at 98% efficiency. Quantum Laboratory systems nominal. Lead Researcher: Dr Chronos. All temporal anchors stable.

items.name: research database terminal
items.description: A computer terminal with access to research archives

items.name: personnel records
items.text: Personnel Database: Dr Chronos - Lead Temporal Researcher. Facility: Quantum Laboratory. Primary Achievement: Development of the Temporal Core power system enabling stable time travel.

items.name: Temporal Gateway entrance
items.description: A massive circular gateway surrounded by glowing conduits. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the lead temporal researcher?
password_questions.hint: Check the research notes and personnel files

password_questions.question: What is the name of this facility?
password_questions.hint: Look at the monitoring station and research documents

password_questions.question: What powers the temporal gateway?
password_questions.hint: The personnel file mentions the power system

rooms.name: Active Temporal Gateway
rooms.description: You stand before the fully activated temporal gateway! Swirling energy fills the massive portal, showing glimpses of different time periods. The gateway hums with power, ready to transport you through time. Control panels display 'TEMPORAL COORDINATES LOCKED - SAFE PASSAGE CONFIRMED'.

items.name: active Temporal Gateway
items.description: A swirling vortex of temporal energy showing your destination time period

items.name: temporal stabilization array
items.description: A ring of devices keeping the portal stable and safe for travel

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have activated the Temporal Gateway and solved all of Dr Chronos's puzzles. The portal swirls with stable temporal energy, ready to transport you through time. You step through the gateway and feel reality shift around you as you travel through the timestream. Your adventure through the Time-Traveler's Workshop is complete! You win!
